tutorialSidebar.label: Chapter 13: Ethics & Future of Physical AI
Chapter Outlines: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook

00-preface.title: Preface
00-preface.description: "The future of AI extends beyond digital spaces into the physical world."

02-ros2-fundamentals.title: Chapter 2: ROS 2 Fundamentals
02-ros2-fundamentals.description: "ROS 2 is the nervous system of modern robots—connecting sensors, actuators, and AI into a unified organism."

03-urdf-robot-modeling.title: Chapter 3: URDF & Robot Modeling
03-urdf-robot-modeling.description: "A robot's URDF is its DNA—defining every link, joint, and sensor that brings it to life in simulation."

04-gazebo-simulation.title: Chapter 4: Gazebo Simulation
04-gazebo-simulation.description: "Simulation is where robots learn to fall a million times so they never fall once in reality."

05-unity-robotics-hub.title: Chapter 5: Unity Robotics Hub
05-unity-robotics-hub.description: "Unity brings photorealism to robotics—where Gazebo shows you physics, Unity shows you reality."

06-isaac-sim-basics.title: Chapter 6: NVIDIA Isaac Sim Basics
06-isaac-sim-basics.description: "Isaac Sim is where photorealism meets physics—training robots in worlds indistinguishable from reality."

07-isaac-ros-integration.title: Chapter 7: Isaac ROS Integration
07-isaac-ros-integration.description: "Hardware acceleration transforms perception from a bottleneck into a superpower."

08-legged-locomotion.title: Chapter 8: Legged Locomotion
08-legged-locomotion.description: "Walking on two legs is the hardest thing a robot can do—and the most human."

09-manipulation-grasping.title: Chapter 9: Manipulation & Grasping
09-manipulation-grasping.description: "The hand is the visible part of the brain." — Immanuel Kant

10-vision-language-action.title: Chapter 10: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) Models
10-vision-language-action.description: "Language is the scaffold that connects perception to action."

11-capstone-project.title: Chapter 11: Capstone Project
11-capstone-project.description: "The best way to learn robotics is to build a complete system."

12-hardware-guide.title: Chapter 12: Hardware Guide
12-hardware-guide.description: "The right hardware unlocks the right research."

13-ethics-future-physical-ai.title: Chapter 13: Ethics & Future of Physical AI
13-ethics-future-physical-ai.description: "With great computational power comes great responsibility."

CHAPTER_OUTLINES.title: Chapter Outlines: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook
CHAPTER_OUTLINES.description: Status: Draft outlines for Chapters 2-13 (awaiting approval)

example-diagrams.title: Example Mermaid Diagrams
example-diagrams.description: This page demonstrates the various diagram types available in the textbook using Mermaid.js.
